PotentialLearning.SNAP_LAMMPS — Type
Wrapper of the SNAP implementation of LAMMPS, built with LAMMPS.jl
Mathematical formulation: A. P. Thompson et al.
                          http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jcp.2014.12.018
source
PotentialLearning.SNAP_LAMMPS — Method
SNAP_LAMMPS(params::Dict)

Creation of a SNAP_LAMMPS instance based on the configuration parameters

source
PotentialLearning.calc_A — Method
calc_A(path::String, p::SNAP_LAMMPS)

Calculation of the A matrix of SNAP (Eq. 13, 10.1016/j.jcp.2014.12.018)

source
PotentialLearning.error — Method
error(β::Vector{Float64}, p, s::SNAP_LAMMPS)

Error function to perform the learning process (Eq. 14, 10.1016/j.jcp.2014.12.018)

source
PotentialLearning.learn — Method
learn(p::Potential, dft_training_data::Vector{Float64}, params::Dict)

Fit the potentials, forces, and stresses against the DFT data using the configuration parameters.

PotentialLearning.potential_energy — Method
potential_energy(params::Dict, j::Int64, p::Potential)

Calculation of the potential energy of a particular atomic configuration (j). This calculation requires accessing the SNAP implementation of LAMMPS.

source
PotentialLearning.potential_energy — Method
potential_energy(atomic_positions::Vector{Position}, rcut::Float64, p::Potential)

Calculation of the potential energy of a particular atomic configuration. It is based on the atomic positions of the configuration, the rcut, and a particular potential.

source

validate(p::Potential, dft_validation_data::Vector{Float64}, params::Dict)

Validate trained potentials, forces, and stresses.
